sentence: As  his  lips  opened  slightly  with  the  suspicious  of  a  half  -  smile  ,  I  said  to  myself  ,  again  :  "  What  moves  me  so  deeply  ,  about  this  little  prince  who  is  sleeping  here  ,  is  his  loyalty  to  a  flower  -  -  the  image  of  a  rose  that  shines  through  his  whole  being  like  the  flame  of  a  lamp  ,  even  when  he  is  asleep  ...  "
